name: Technology Research Evaluation
query: Research Trusted Execution Environments (TEEs) as a technology investment opportunity. Focus on technical maturity, moat, and companies building in this space.
expected_behavior: Loads the tech research workflow from Research/workflows/tech.md
Executes parallel MCP calls (parallel-task with deep research, perplexity deep research, exa for papers)
Spawns 3 parallel Task agents (tech-researcher, market-researcher, financial-researcher)
Tech-researcher provides technical depth: architecture, maturity, performance, moat
Market-researcher analyzes adoption trajectory and opportunity sizing
Financial-researcher identifies companies and funding activity
Synthesizer creates technology research report with investment implications

must_have: Companies building with this tech identified
quality_indicators: References to research papers or technical documentation
Specific performance metrics (e.g., '1-second auctions' for TEE speed)
Connection to cyberâ€¢Fund focus areas (privacy, AI infra)
Clear assessment of wrapper risk vs. true innovation

test_variants: Research an emerging technology (world models, test-time compute)
Research a technology outside focus areas (to test thesis filtering)
notes: Tests technical research depth and ability to connect technology to investment opportunities. Should demonstrate strong technical understanding.
